SELECT SensorID as sensorId, case when windDir = 0 then 'N' when windDir > 0 and windDir < 90 then 'NE' when windDir = 90 then 'E' when windDir > 90 and windDir < 180 then 'SE' when windDir = 180 then 'N' when windDir > 180 and windDir < 270 then 'NW' when windDir = 270 then 'W' when windDir > 270 and windDir < 360 then 'NW' end as windDir, WindSpeed as windSpeed from ( SELECT SensorID, concat(ROUND(WindSpeed / 100, 0), ' m/s') AS WindSpeed, WindDirection as windDir, RCVTime FROM pier_env WHERE SensorID = #{sensorId}
)a ORDER BY RCVTime DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SensorID as sensorId, concat(WindDirection, ' Â°') as windDir, concat(ROUND(WindSpeed / 100, 0), ' m/s') as windSpeed, count(*) over (partition by SensorID order by RCVTime desc) cnt, lux, concat(RHumidity, ' %') as RHumidity, DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ( DATE_FORMAT(RCVTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00'), '+0:00', '+09:00') ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00') as nowTime FROM pier_env WHERE date_format(RCVTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= str_to_date(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND date_format(RCVTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') < str_to_date(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') )data WHERE cnt = 1 ORDER BY sensorId ASC
